advancedhud.api

Class HudItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • advancedhud.api.HudItem
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HudItemAir, HudItemArmor, HudItemBossBar, HudItemCrosshairs, HudItemExperienceBar, HudItemFood, HudItemHealth, HudItemHealthMount, HudItemHotbar, HudItemJumpBar, HudItemRecordDisplay, HudItemScoreboard, HudItemTooltips

    public abstract class HudItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Extend this to create your own elements which render on the GUI.
    Don't worry about saves, they are all done by the non-api part of the mod.
    Author:
    maxpowa

      • getDefaultAlignment

        public abstract Alignment getDefaultAlignment()
        Default Alignment of the HudItem instance.

        For resolution-based movement, alignment values allow shifting along the alignment axis.

        Returns:
        Alignment

        public void tick()
        Called upon .updateTick(). If you use this, make sure you set
